text:
i has installed apache web server, with no error duering installation
but when i start apache
got error message for every moment

Apache : cannot determine local host name.
Use the ServerName directive to set it manually.

can you help me to fix this error

Thankx and Regards to all of you
Merry Christmas to all of you

By
Sunny Bells (Narix)
